name: Global uniques
uniques: [-75]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [0] Happiness>
Nullifies Growth [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness>
Rebel units may spawn <when below [0] Happiness>
[+10]% growth [in all cities] <during We Love The King Day>
Nullifies All Yield <while is in resistance>
Triggers a [Ancient Culture] event<upon turn end><before turn number [2]>
